rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A madsrdf:HierarchicalGeographic indicates that its label is the concatenation of labels from a sequence of madsrdf:Geographic types taken from one of the madsrdf:Geographic sub-classes such as madsrdf:City, madsrdf:Country, madsrdf:State, madsrdf:Region, madsrdf:Area, etc. The madsrdf:Geographic resources that constitute the madsrdf:HierarchicalGeographic should have a broader to narrower hierarchical relationship between them.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Hierarchical Geographic Type

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Use for variants that are searchable, but not necessarily for display.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Has Hidden Variant

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Language that a person, organization, or family uses for publication, communication, etc., or in which a work is expressed.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Associated Language
Language Type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Describes a resource whose label represents a language.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Note
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A note about the resource.
Describes a resource whose label is the name of a corporate entity, which may include political or ecclesiastical entities.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Corporate Name Type
Citation Status
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Should use a standard term - such as 'found' or 'not found' - to indicate whether the cited resource yielded information about the resource related to the madsrdf:Source.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: History Note
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A note pertaining to the history of the resource.

A madsrdf:Collection is an organizational unit, members of which will have some form of intellectually unifying theme but not to the extent that it defines an independent knowledge organization system. It aggregates madsrdf:Authority descriptions or other madsrdf:MADSCollection resources.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: MADS Collection

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A concept with a controlled label.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Authority

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Associates a Real World Object with its Authority description.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is Identified By Authority

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Establishes a relationship between an Authority and one from a different MADS Scheme. It is reciprocal, so the relationship must be shared.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Has Reciprocal External Authority
Has Affiliation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Property to associate an individual, such as a foaf:Agent, to a group or organization with which an individual is or has been affiliated.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Has MADSCollection Member
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Associates an Authority or other Collection with a madsrdf:MADSCollection.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Country
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Country associated with an address.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Personal Name Type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Describes a resource whose label represents a personal name.
A profession or occupation in which the person works or has worked.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Occupation

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The field of activity associated with an individual.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Field of Activity

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identifies an Authority that is at the top of the hierarchy of authorities within the MADS Scheme.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Has Top Member of MADS Scheme

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A madsrdf:Identifier resource describes an identifier by associating the identifier value with its type. To be used to record identifiers for a resource in the absence of URIs.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Other Identifier
Genre/Form Type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Describes a resource whose label is a genre or form term. Genre terms for textual materials designate specific kinds of materials distinguished by the style or technique of their intellectual contents; for example, biographies, catechisms, essays, hymns, or reviews. Form terms designate historically and functionally specific kinds of materials as distinguished by an examination of their physical character, characteristics of their intellectual content, or the order of information within them; for example, daybooks, diaries, directories, journals, memoranda, questionnaires, syllabi, or time sheets. In the context of graphic materials, genre headings denote categories of material distinguished by vantage point, intended purpose, characteristics of the creator, publication status, or method of representation.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Country Type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Describes a resource whose label is a country, i.e. a political entity considered a country.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Citation Source
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The cited resource.
The town, city, province, state, and/or country in which a person was born.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Place of Birth

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Associates an Authority or Collection with a madsrdf:MADSScheme.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Has MADS Scheme Member

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: madsrdf:SimpleType is a resource with a label constituting a single word or phrase.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Simple Type

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The year a person was born. Date of birth may also include the month and day of the person's birth. (RDA 9.3.2.1)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Birth Date
Conference Name Type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Describes a resource whose label represents a conference name.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Has Broader External Authority
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Creates a direct relationship between an Authority and a more broadly defined Authority from a different MADS Scheme.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Administrative Metadata
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This relates an Authority or Variant to its administrative metadata, which is, minimimally, a Class defined outside of the MADS/RDF namespace. The RecordInfo Class from the RecordInfo ontology is recommended.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Topic Type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Describes a resource whose label represents a topic.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Has Narrower Authority
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Creates a direct relationship between an Authority and one that is more narrowly defined.
The town, city, province, state, and/or country in which a person died.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Place of Death

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Describes a resource whose label is any extraterrestrial entity or space, including a solar system, a galaxy, a star system, and a planet, including a geographic feature of an individual planet.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Extraterrestrial Area Type

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Designation indicative of royalty, nobility, or ecclesiastical rank or office, or a term of address for a person of religious vocation.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Honorary Title

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Describes a resource whose label represents an occcupation.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Occupation Type

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Describes a resource whose label represents a title.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Title Type
Temporal Type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Describes a resource whose label represents a time-based notion.

Any attribute that serves to characterize a person, family or corporate body or that may be needed for differentiation from other persons. families or corporate bodies and for which separate content designation is not already defined.Or
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Entity Descriptor
Island Type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Describes a resource whose label is a tract of land surrounded by water and smaller than a continent but is not itself a separate country.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Province Type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Describes a resource whose label is a first order political division, e.g. Ontario, within a country, e.g. Canada.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Has Identifier
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Associates a resource with a madsrdf:Identifier.

The label of a madsrdf:ComplexSubject is the concatenation of labels from two or more madsrdf:SimpleType descriptions, except that the combination of madsrdf:SimpleType labels for the madsrdf:ComplexSubject does not meet the conditions to be the label of a madsrdf:NameTitle resource or madsrdf:HierarchicalGeographic resource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Complex Subject Type

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A code is a string of characters associated with a the authoritative or deprecated label. It may record an historical notation once used to uniquely identify a concept.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Code
Work end
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Ending date of the date range for which the beginning date is recorded in madsrdf:creationDateStart.
Establishes a relationship between two Authority resources. It is reciprocal, so the relationship must be shared. This is Related type='equivalent' in MADS XML.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Has Reciprocal Authority
Classification
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The classification code associated with a madsrdf:Authority.
Describes a resource whose label is a non-jurisdictional geographic entity.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Area Type

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A resource that represents the source of information about another resource. madsrdf:Source is a type of citation.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Source
Has Earlier Established Form
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Used to reference a resource that was an earlier form. This is Related type='earlier' in MADS XML.
A resource whose label is the alternate form of an Authority or Deprecated Authority.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Variant

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A former Authority.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Deprecated Authority

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The scheme associated with the identifier. For example, "LCCN" would be used when the Identifier Value (madsrdf:idValue) is a LC Control Number.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Identifier Scheme

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A label entered for discovery purposes but not shown.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Hidden Label

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Latest date in a period of activity.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Activity End
City
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The city component of an address.
The year a corporate body was established. Date of establishment may also include the month and day of the corporate body's establishment.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Established

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Describes a resource whose label is an inhabited place incorporated as a city, town, etc.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: City Type
Affiliation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A resource that describes an individual's affiliation with an organization or group, such as the nature of the affiliation and the active dates.
A well-known individual who is a member of the family.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Prominent Family Member

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Describes a resource whose label is an area that has the status of a jurisdiction, usually incorporating more than one first level jurisdiction.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Region Type
Has Exact External Authority
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Records a relationship between an Authority and one to which it matches exactly but from a different MADS Scheme.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Organization or Group
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The group or organization with which an individual is associated.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Has Source
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Associates a resource description with its Source.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Real World Object
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A madsrdf:RWO is an abstract entity and identifies a Real World Object (RWO) identified by the label of a madsrdf:Authority or madsrdf:DeprecatedAuthority.
The state associated with an address.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: State

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The year a person died. Date of death may also include the month and day of the person's death. (RDA 9.3.3.1)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Death Date
Identifier Value
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The value of the identifier conforming to the Identifier Scheme syntax.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Citation Note
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A note about how the madsrdf:Source relates to the resource about which the madsrdf:Source is the information source.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Nature of Affiliation
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Records the individual's role or position in the organization with which the individual is affiliated. A "job title" might be appropriate.
Associates a Variant with an Authority or Deprecrated Authority. Unless the variant type can be more specifically identified, use 'hasVariant.'
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Has Variant
Has Translation Variant
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A Variant whose label represents a translation of that of the authoritative label.
Establishes a relationship between a CorporateName Authority and one of the same that is more broadly defined.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Has Parent Organization

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A label once considered authoritative (controlled and curated) but which is no longer.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Deprecated Label

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A example of how the resource might be used.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Example Note

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Describes a resource whose label is one of seven large landmasses on Earth. These are: Asia, Africa, Europe, North America, South America, Australia, and Antarctica.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Continent Type

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A note pertaining to the management of the label associated with the resource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Editorial Note

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Associates a madsrdf:Authority with the Real World Object that is the subject of the authority's label.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Identifies RWO
Has Close External Authority
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Records a relationship between an Authority and one that is closely related from a different MADS Scheme.
Describes a resource whose label represents a family name.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Family Name Type
Element
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: madsrdf:Element types describe the various parts of labels.
A lexical string representing a controlled, curated label for the Authority.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Authoritative Label

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date an individual ceased to be affiliated with an organization.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Affiliation Ended
Is Top Member of MADS Scheme
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Identifies a MADS Scheme in which the Authority is at the top of the hierarchy.
The country or other territorial jurisdiction from which a work originated.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Work locale

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The address of the group or organization with which an individual is associated.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Has Affiliation Address

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Fax number
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Fax
City Section Type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Describes a resource whose label is a smaller unit within a populated place, e.g., a neighborhood, park, or street.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is Parent Organization Of
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Establishes a relationship between a CorporateName Authority and one of the same that is more narrowly defined.
A note detailing a modification to an Authority or Variant.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Change Note
Definition Note
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: An explanation of the meaning of an Authority, DeprecatedAuthority, or Variant description.
Describes a resource whose label is a first order political division, e.g. Montana, within a country, e.g. U.S.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: State Type
Element List
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The madsrdf:elementList property is used to organize the various parts of labels.

MADS Scheme is an organizational unit that describes a knowledge organization system. It aggregates madsrdf:Authority descriptions and/or madsrdf:MADSCollection resources included in the knowledge organization system. Including a madsrdf:MADSCollection within a madsrdf:MADSScheme should be done with care; when a madsrdf:MADSCollection is part of a madsrdf:MADSScheme, then any madsrdf:Authority within that madsrdf:MADSCollection is effectively also in the madsrdf:MADSScheme.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: MADS Scheme

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: This document describes the MADS/RDF (Metadata Authority Description Schema in RDF) vocabulary, a data model for authority and vocabulary data used within the library and information science (LIS) community, which is inclusive of museums, archives, and other cultural institutions. It is presented as an OWL ontology. MADS/RDF is a knowledge organization system (KOS) designed for use with controlled values for names (personal, corporate, geographic, etc.), thesauri, taxonomies, subject heading systems, and other controlled value lists. It is closely related to SKOS, the Simple Knowledge Organization System and a widely supported and adopted RDF vocabulary. Given the close relationship between the aim of MADS/RDF and the aim of SKOS, the MADS ontology has been fully mapped to SKOS. Unlike SKOS, however, which is very broad in its application, MADS/RDF is designed specifically to support authority data as used by and needed in the LIS community and its technology systems. For example, MADS/RDF provides a means to record data from the Machine Readable Cataloging (MARC) Authorities format in RDF for use in semantic applications and Linked Data projects. MADS/RDF is designed to support the description of cultural and bibliographic resources. Data described using MADS/RDF, therefore, assists with identifying and annotating bibliographic and cultural resources. MADS/RDF is not focused on the description of Real World Objects. Although a MADS/RDF description may contain information specific to the Real World Object associated with the MADS/RDF authoritative label, the MADS/RDF ontology distinguishes between these two entities the RWO and the Authority. Updated: 29 October 2015. Addition of new properties, madsrdf:activityEndDate, madsrdf:activityStartDate, madsrdf:associatedLanguage, madsrdf:associatedLocale, madsrdf:birthDate, madsrdf:birthPlace, madsrdf:deathDate, madsrdf:deathPlace, madsrdf:entityDescriptor, madsrdf:establishDate, madsrdf:fieldOfActivity, madsrdf:gender, madsrdf:hasAffiliation, madsrdf:honoraryTitle, madsrdf:isIdentifiedByAuthority, madsrdf:occupation, madsrdf:prominentFamilyMember, madsrdf:terminateDate, madsrdf:fullerName, madsrdf:creationDateStart, madsrdf:creationDateEnd, madsrdf:workOrigin, madsrdf:hasChararacteristic. The MADS/RDF to SKOS/RDF mapping was done by Antoine Isaac. The MADS/RDF model and ontology benefited significantly as a result of the fruitful discussions surrounding his effort to map the MADS/RDF ontology to SKOS.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: MADS/RDF (Metadata Authority Description Schema in RDF)
Activity Start
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Earliest date in a period of activity.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Geographic Authority
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Describes a resource whose label represents a geographic place or feature, especially when a more precise geographic determination (City, Country, Region, etc.) cannot be made.
The gender with which a person identifies.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Gender

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Creates a direct relationship between an Authority and a more narrowly defined Authority from a different MADS Scheme.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Has Narrower External Authority

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The lexical, variant form of an authoritative label.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Variant Label

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Denotes a relationship between an Authority and/or DeprecatedAuthority. The relationship may or may or may not be reciprocated and there is no certainty that the related resource will further illuminate the original resource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: See Also
Name Type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Describes a resource whose label represents a name, especially when a more precise Name type (madsrdf:ConferenceName, masdrdf:FamilyName, etc.) cannot be identified.
Describes a resource whose label is the largest local administrative unit, e.g. Warwickshire, in a country, e.g. England.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: County Type

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Describes a resource whose label is a geographical area belonging to or under the jurisdiction of a governmental authority.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Territory Type
Associated Locale
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A town, city, province, state, and/or country associated with persons, corporate bodies, families, works, and expressions.
A note pertaining to the deletion of a resource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Deletion Note

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Unless the relationship can be more specifically identified, use 'hasRelatedAuthority.'
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Has Related Authority
Work begun
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: For a work, earliest date (normally the year) associated with a work; that date may be the date the work was created or first published or released. For an expression, the earliest date (normally the year) associated with an expression; that date may be the date of the earliest known manifestation of that expression. In both cases the date may be the starting date of a range or a single date.

The label of a madsrdf:NameTitle resource is the concatenation of a label of a madsrdf:Name description and the label of a madsrdf:Title description. Both description types (madsrdf:Name and madsrdf:Title) are of madsrdf:SimpleType types.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Name/Title Type
Use Instead
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: "Use [This Other Resource] Instead." Traditional "USE" reference.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Complex Type
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: madsrdf:ComplexType is a resource whose label is the concatenation of labels from two or more Authority descriptions or two or more Variant descriptions or some combination of Authority and Variant descriptions, each of a madsrdf:SimpleType.

rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is Member Of MADSCollection
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Associates a Collection with a madsrdf:Authority or another madsrdf:MADSCollection.
madsrdf:componentList organizes the madsrdf:SimpleType resources whose labels are represented in the label of the associated madsrdf:ComplexType resource.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Component List

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A term that specifies a characteristic that differentiates a work or expression from another one.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Other characteristic

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: First line of address. For second line, use madsrdf:extendedAddress.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Street Address
Use For
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: "Use [This Resource] For." Traditional "USE FOR" reference.
The second address line, if needed.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Extended Address

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The year a corporate body was terminated. Date of termination may also include the month and day of the corporate body's termination.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Terminated
Has Later Established Form
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Use to reference the later form of a resource. This is Related type='later' in MADS XML.
Full form of name needed to distinguish a person from another person with the same preferred name.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Fuller Name

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: The date an individual established an affiliation with an organization.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Affiliation Started
